means: 罗盘方位，罗盘方位单位

sentence.Network_en: The course which will cut each meridian at the same angle is termed a rhumb line.
sentence.Network_cn: 与每一子午线相交成同一角度的航向叫恒向线.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French rumb (earlier ryn (de vent) 'point of the compass'), probably from Dutch ruim 'space, room'. The spelling change was due to association with Latin rhombus (see rhombus)

means.word_mean: 1. a line on a sphere that cuts all meridians at the same angle; the path taken by a ship or plane that maintains a constant compass direction
